How can I use the `listcurrencies` command to retrieve a list of available currencies in Verus using the command line?

You can use the `listcurrencies` command to retrieve a list of available currencies in Verus by running the following command:
```
verus listcurrencies true
```

Examples: > verus listcurrencies true > curl --user myusername --data-binary '{"jsonrpc": "1.0", "id":"curltest", "method": "listcurrencies", "params": [true] }' -H 'content-type: text/plain;' http://127.0.0.1:27486/
